name: 洪媽益
objective: 本課程主要在培養進階寫作能力，採用功能導向的方式，諸如書函，文章／書本摘要，評論，創作，學術專技報告等專項進行演練。
schedule:
March 6		Orientation; Lecture: Choosing a Topic
March 13		Presentation: Topic A
Lecture: The Thesis and the Outline
March 20		Presentation: Topic B
			Lecture: Citation Formats
March 27		Library visit
April 10		REF Works (Library)
			Submit Outline
April 17		Lecture: Mechanics / Argument
			Submit References
April 24		Lecture: Writing, Reading, Thinking
			Presentation: Elements of Style Chaps 1~2; Submit Annotated References
May 1		Lecture: Writing Strategies; Note-taking and the Rough Draft
May 22		Lecture: Methodology; Drafting and Revising
Presentation: Elements of Style Chap 5
June 5		Lecture: Results, Discussion, and Conclusion
			Submit draft of Methodology
June 12		Final Presentations 
June 26		Final paper due
END
scorePolicy:
HW: 10% each = 40%
Oral Presentation: 20% 
Final presentation: 20% (+ peer review)
Final paper: 20%
materials:
Anderson, Chalon and Amy Carrell. 2004. APA and MLA writing formats. New York: Pearson. (required)
Anson, Chris M. and Robert A. Schwegler. 2005. The Longman handbook for writers and readers. Fourth edition. New York: Pearson.
Strunk, William Jr. and E. B. White. 2000. The elements of style. Fourth edition. New York: Pearson. (required)
